name: World Stadium 3
overview: World Stadium 3 is the third game in Playstation of the World Stadium series. This version of the game features new game modes and the Pocketstation feature that allow the player to create his own characters, play mini games and bring two friends to play with each other. The game features a lot of different modes even a music composser in which the player can select where to put the different notes and then listen to the melodies. Game Modes: - VS Mode: Play against another human player or against the computer. - Season Mode: Choose a team and play a season. - Free Mode: Create a tournament choosing 6 different teams and try to win the cup. - Quest: Mode: In this mode the player controls a samurai in the Japan Medieval and try to defeat them in a baseball match to win his lands. - Mini games: Choose a character and play different mini games of batting, throwing, etc. - Training Mode: This mode lets the player practice batting, throwing and catching. The game also features other game modes that will be unlocked playing the main modes.
